name: Double Skinned Milk
author: Joyce
summary: This is a Chinese dessert of steamed milk, very simple to make. It is smooth and creamy and perfect for a sweet tooth. Serve warm or cold.
directions: Pour milk into 2 bowls; cover with aluminum foil
Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer
Add bowls of milk, cover, and steam, about 5 minutes
Allow layer of skin to form on top of milk
Flip up a corner of the milk skin and pour milk into an empty bowl, reserving the milk skin in the bowl
Whisk egg whites and sugar together in a bowl; pour in the milk and mix well
Pour milk mixture back into the 2 bowls under the reserved milk skin
Steam milk mixture until set, about 15 minutes
